name: Running For Godot
description:
My entry for Godot Game Jan January 2017.

Everything is Public Domain CC0.

Source code is available at https://bitbucket.org/signalsin/running-for-godot

Feel free to follow my blog at https://halfwaywronggames.tumblr.com

These are things I didn't make and who should take the credit for them:

  • Level and character artwork: Kenney - http://kenney.nl/assets
  • GUI artwork: CTatz - http://opengameart.org/content/free-ui-asset-pack-...
  • Music: Écrivain - http://opengameart.org/content/meadow-thoughts
